letter.body: I am writing you to find out why I haven't received my free coupon from the Winoten-balance full survey completion. I completed your survey and my mother did the same and she received hers two months ago. Could you please check your files and send me my free coupon.
letter.postscript: Also, I ordered a Denim Blue Jean Jacket (large) from your sale at QWey almost a year ago. I mailed the required prepayment. Please check into this and mail me my jacket. I'm only feeling the trouble because my friend has the same jacket and I'd like to have mine.
